meanings.sent1: Her overzealousness support for the team was evident in her loud cheers at every game.
meanings.sent2: His overzealousness approach to work often led to burnout and exhaustion.
meanings.sent3: The overzealousness puppy wagged its tail so vigorously that it knocked over a vase.
meanings.sent4: The overzealousness gardener trimmed the bushes so meticulously that they resembled perfectly shaped animals.
meanings.sent5: The overzealousness student's eagerness to answer every question made the class more engaging.

meanings.definition: Acting with excessive zeal or fervor.
meanings.sent1: The overzealousness fans painted their faces in team colors and chanted loudly throughout the game.
meanings.sent2: Her overzealousness dedication to her craft earned her recognition as the hardest worker in the office.
meanings.sent3: The overzealousness chef added so many spices to the dish that it became nearly inedible.
meanings.sent4: The overzealousness politician campaigned tirelessly, attending every event in the district.
meanings.sent5: The overzealousness explorer ventured into uncharted territories, driven by a thirst for discovery.
